paragraphs.text: %sql SELECT name, count(to_user_id) as count FROM likes_temp JOIN actresses_and_actors_perm ON (likes_temp.to_user_id = actresses_and_actors_perm.id) GROUP BY name ORDER BY count DESC LIMIT 5

result.msg:
name	count
Morgan Freeman	9
James Franco	5
Robert De Niro	5
Leonardo DiCaprio	5
Anthony Hopkins	5

paragraphs.title: Aggregate Most Desirable Users by Count

result.msg: mostDesirableUsersByLikeCountDF: org.apache.spark.sql.DataFrame = [id: int, name: string, img: string, count: bigint]

paragraphs.title: Save Top-K Recs to elasticSearch
paragraphs.text:
import org.elasticsearch.spark.sql._
import org.apache.spark.sql.SaveMode

val esConfig = Map("pushdown" -> "true", "es.nodes" -> "demo.fluxcapacitor.com", "es.port" -> "39200")
mostDesirableUsersByLikeCountDF.write.format("org.elasticsearch.spark.sql").mode(SaveMode.Overwrite).options(esConfig).save("fluxcapacitor/top-users-by-count")
